metadata.Title: CVE-2022-46879 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Mozilla developers and community members Lukas Bernhard, Gabriele Svelto,Randell Jesup, and the Mozilla Fuzzing Team reported memory safety bugspresent in Firefox 107. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memorycorruption and we presume that with enough effort some of these could havebeen exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox <108.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
